General.Name: Longyan Zhuoyue New Energy Co Ltd
General.Description: Longyan Zhuoyue New Energy Co., Ltd., a renewable company, engages in the producing and sale of biodiesel from waste oil in China. The company offers bioester plasticizers, industrial glycerin, and alkyd resins. It also exports its products. The company was founded in 2001 and is based in Longyan, China.

1.Name: Mr. Xuedong  Zheng
1.Title: Deputy GM & Sec. of the Board
